Articles.Content: Version 1.0.2.812 - After establishing a stable orbit and leaving the game, upon restart, when I take over ('fly') the saved object, it immediately explodes, leaving only the command capsule. Not every time, but enough that I worry with each time I start up and resume a flight. Anybody else see this, or have any helpful suggestions?

Hi drburns650, 1.0.2 is out of date, please update to 1.0.5.01028.

If the problem persists please upload the affected persistent.sfs to dropbox for us.
